title: Kevin Durant, Russell Wilson, Zion Williamson, and LeBron James
itunes:title: Kevin Durant, Russell Wilson, Zion Williamson, and LeBron James
description:
Colin explains the issues of Golden State Warriors F Kevin Durant, his thoughts on Seattle Seahawks QB Russell Wilson's new deal, Duke F Zion Williamson entering the NBA draft, and his currant gripe with Los Angeles Lakers F LeBron James. Guests include Doug Gottlieb, Matt Barnes, Albert Breer, and Jim Jackson.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
